title: (09002) Burgos - 2 Calle Miranda
description: Lacolada H3 laundry. Machines 12kg, 16kg  and dryer . From 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

title: (09002) Burgos - 7 Plaza de Santa Teresa
description: # SPECIAL BUS # free parking. practical to visit the city that is done in a maximum day. flat, full sun, rubbish a few car spots in the same spot, but I don't know if it was paid for or not.

title: (09002) Burgos - 9-11 Calle Cartuja de Miraflores
description: Toll parking. Next to the museum of evolution. There are not many places but it is very central and safe to leave the camper. There is a cycle path and a green area by the river for walking. The center is only 10 minutes away on foot. There are many sources for all burgos. Small vehicle only

title: (09003) Burgos - 11 Paseo de la Audiencia
description: A fountain with fresh drinkable water. Big tap easy to fill up bottles and jerrycan. PS: step on the button on the ground for the water to come out

title: (09003) Burgos - 2A Calle San Esteban
description: Quite spot to fill your water reservoirs. Parking and vista nearby.

title: (09001) Burgos - 3 Paseo Empecinado
description:
Excellent!
We parked here for free for a few hours! The city is easy to reach.

title: (09001) Burgos - 2 Calle Alicante
description: Parking with pool for water recently conditioned. 22 places for AC. 15 minutes walk from the cathedral. 72h max.

title: (09003) Burgos - 127 Calle San Francisco
description: Small dirt parking lot. There are a lot of cars but we were able to park a 7.5m without problem

title: (09006) Burgos - 12 Carretera del Castillo
description: Nice place near the castle and outside the center, which can be reached in 10 minutes on foot by a dirt road and stairs. We spent the night there on a Saturday evening of a town festival, there was no one there, very quiet. We only wait for the birdsong when we wake up.

title: (09006) Burgos - 16 Avenida Cantabria
description: Automatic laundry services: wash and dry

title: (09001) Burgos - 37 Calle Doctor José Luis Santamaría
title_short: (09001) Burgos - 37 Calle Doctor José Luis Santamaría
description: Place to park and visit Burgos, 10 minutes from the cathedral.

title: (09001) Burgos - 56 Calle San Pedro y San Felices
title_short: (09001) Burgos - 56 Calle San Pedro y San Felices
description: Parking in battery, allows the diagonal so that the truck does not protrude. There were motor homes, trucks ...

address.street: 56 Calle San Pedro y San Felices

title: (09001) Burgos - 11A Avenida Palencia
description: Spacious parking near the center, gas station right next door.

title: (09001) Burgos - 18 Calle Santa Ana
description: Large sandy parking lot with many flat areas. Easy access

title: (09001) Burgos - 34 Calle San Pedro y San Felices
title_short: (09001) Burgos - 34 Calle San Pedro y San Felices
description: Large lot, muddy when it rains, settling down at the end of the street is stable and quiet. Space for around 6 motorhomes

address.street: 34 Calle San Pedro y San Felices

title: (09001) Burgos - 18 Calle Luis Rodríguez Arango
description: Parking spaces in a street, not delimited, free. A Mercadona supermarket right next door. 15 minutes walk from Plaza Mayor.

title: (09003) Burgos - 2 Calle de las Corazas
description: Wild dirt parking accessible to HGVs no greater than 12t… parts of the area have Shade.

title: (09006) Burgos -
description:
End of the loop road of a dead end, after the quiet but very sloping car park listed next to it.
Lots of space, vague noise from the city, very quiet, passage of joggers and mountain bikers. Trash but no service.

title: (09006) Burgos - S/N Calle Cruz Roja
description: Drinking water fountain right next to parking possibility to walk into town from there. In order for water to flow, the golden button on the right must be pressed with your foot

title: (09001) Burgos - 67 Calle Alfonso VIII
description: Very nice place for a picnic near the playground just outside the walls of the monastery. Very adequate for children, residential zone, very few traffic and lots of space. No other amenities besides the fountain and the café across the street. Beautiful.

title: (09001) Burgos - 6 Calle Luis Rodríguez Arango
description: Quiet dead end street between two parks in front of the monastery.

title: (09006) Burgos - s/n Calle Francisco de Vitoria
title_short: (09006) Burgos - s/n Calle Francisco de Vitoria
description: Relatively quiet street parking. Cars pass by from time to time. We stayed one night. We found it useful and safe when the other sites are full.

title: (09006) Burgos - 8B Calle Río Nela
description: Dirt parking lot, quite flat and plenty of room to manoeuvre, even with large ACs (7m or more).

title: (09006) Burgos - 1 Calle Juan Bravo
description: Lacolada Laundry. 1 x 12kg washing machine, 2 x 16kg washing machines, 2 x 18kg tumble dryer

title: (09001) Burgos - 85 Carretera de Arcos
description: Small car park 2 km from the highway. shaded calm, perfect for a stopover.

title: (09001) Burgos - 4 N-120
description: Pool parking. With many spaces and they do not protrude from the car park. Possibility of parking under roof.

title: (09003) Burgos - s/n Carretera Cementerio de San José
title_short: (09003) Burgos - s/n Carretera Cementerio de San José
description: Paved car park next to the municipal cemetery, no ban on motorhomes, secured by the lighting of the place.

address.street: s/n Carretera Cementerio de San José

title: (09006) Burgos - farmacéutico Obdulio Fernández
description: Motorhome area next to the Alcampo shopping mall, quiet area to spend the night and with several reserved parking spaces. Attention! This car park is totally prohibited on market days for local fruit and vegetable producers, Wednesdays and Saturdays from 7:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

title: (09001) Burgos - 3 Calle Batalla Navas de Tolosa
title_short: (09001) Burgos - 3 Calle Batalla Navas de Tolosa
description: Very quiet parking area. Next to a park and 5 minutes walk from Las Huelgas (obligatory view in Burgos). The floor is flat and there is usually room for about 4 campers.

title: (09001) Burgos - Camino de Valdechoque
description:
Shopping Center, Mc'Donalds, Decathlon..
large parking, no height railing,

title: (09001) Burgos - 11 Avenida José María Villacián Rebollo
title_short: (09001) Burgos - 11 Avenida José María Villacián Rebollo
description: Parking at the science faculty. They have not put me in any kind of problem considering that it is August and the university is closed, only parking. Possibility of shade.

title: (09006) Burgos - 27 Calle Gonzalo de Berceo
description: Free municipal parking. Flat paved terrain with a slight slope in some sections. Quiet at night. Possibility of discharge of black and gray water. Drinking water filling fountain and clean water filling tap in the wide-mouth tank. The service column is not far from the car park, past the play area in the part intended for cars. Land in excellent condition. Free Unfortunately far from the center about 3.5 km.

title: (09007) Burgos - 13 Calle Doña Constanza
description: Laundry close to the new created area.

title: (09007) Burgos - 9 Glorieta Ismael García Rámila
description: La campa del silo is a car park in the neighborhood of Gamonal. It is located between a school and the municipal swimming pools of Capiscol. Access is in the Fernando de Rojas passage, just outside the pilgrim's roundabout, towards Human Rights Avenue. In the Fernando de Rojas passage, make sure that cars do not come from the front. During the week it is a quiet place with many services and buses nearby. On weekends it is less recommended, there is a party and noise. One part is paved and the other is dirt. It is close to the beach of Fuente Prior, which is a typical walk for the people of Burgos, and a little further away there are beautiful natural sites: Fuentes Blancas, the Wetland...

title: (09001) Burgos - 1 Plaza Virgen del Pilar
description: Nice free parking on the outskirts of Burgos, near the church and public soccer field. Drinking water fountain, located in a residential area

title: (09193) Burgos - Carretera de la Cartuja
description: Picnic area in front of the monastery walls. very quiet and level, good access. We stayed there one night.

name: Camping Municipal Fuentes Blancas
title: (09193) Camping Municipal Fuentes Blancas
description: Burgos, BU-800. Camping Fuentés Blancas near Burgos. The bus drops you off in the center, the stop is on the road just at the entrance to the campsite. The locations are not very well delimited and those without gene easily take 2 or even 3 locations. Many people have a very limited pool factory.

title: (09193) - 7 Diseminado Villayuda
description: Outdoor parking at Camping Fuentes Blancas. You can spend the night without problems, a quiet night, a source of drinking water, garbage cans, picnic tables, green areas and a greenway crosses it to walk, run, ride a bike.

title: (09007) Burgos - Esteban Sáez Alvarado 33
description: New self-service laundry. Open from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. every day of the year. Includes softener, active oxygen and detergent. In the surroundings there is a bakery, fishmonger, greengrocer and butcher. Ideal to buy while you do the laundry and not waste time. Highly recommended.

title: (09007) Burgos - 80 Calle Páramo
description: Industrial estate with video surveillance, very quiet at night and with a gas station in front. I have left the motorhome here without any problem

title: (09007) Burgos - Km. 108 N-120
description: Repsol petrol station with LPG on pump & bottled gas too.

title: (09007) Burgos - 1 Calle María Moliner
description: The cheapest washing machine found in Burgos, clean and new. There are two 20kg washing machines and one 10kg, 2 dryers. Coin change inside. Easy programs and temperatures up to 60 degrees (cycle duration 40 minutes). Opening hours 8 am - 10 pm

title: (09193) Burgos - Las Hazas
description: Perfect spot in the forest, just so calm and peaceful! Night was beautiful and quiet.

title: (09193) Burgos - BU-800
description: In the recreational area of white sources area, zip wire, swings, slides, barbecues, bar, ice cream parlor, bus stop to Burgos, sources, on the banks of the Arlanzón River, and on the edge of a wooded hill.

title: (09193) Burgos - BU-800
description:
Small parking lot next to a bar, ideal with children because large playground, picnic table, several drinking water fountains in the park.
Not busy in a week day in August.

title: (09007) Villayuda -
description: In the middle of nature a few minutes from the city center by car, not a bad place to spend the night. You can hear a little from the highway not far away, but that's not a problem. Hikers pass in the morning. The nearby river offers pleasant swimming spots, unfortunately there is a lot of waste that spoils the experience.

title: (09193) Burgos - Las Hazas
description: Parking in the ground, pay attention to the entrance of the car park if too much cantilever, quiet except runners and hikers

name: Fuentes Blancas
title: (09193) Fuentes Blancas
description: Small area away from crowded BBQ places. Shady, fairly flat, picnic tables, but quite noisy (roads) and no service.

title: (09193) Burgos -
description: Old parking in nature, space for +/- 8 campers / vans

title: (09195) Villagonzalo Pedernales - 25A Calle Francisco Ruiz Valverde
title_short: (09195) Villagonzalo Pedernales - 25A Calle Francisco Ruiz Valverde
description: Drinking water fountain Perfect for refilling.

title: (09195) Villagonzalo Pedernales - 6 Avenida Alfoz de Villagonzalo
title_short: (09195) Villagonzalo Pedernales - 6 Avenida Alfoz de Villagonzalo
description: Level dirt truck parking. there is a good restaurant next door and a gas station nearby.

title: (09199) Burgos - Calle Obidus
description: Gravel space at a soccer field. No official parking lot. We stood here and had a quiet night.

title: (09193) Carcedo de Burgos - 2 Avenida de la Golondrina
title_short: (09193) Carcedo de Burgos - 2 Avenida de la Golondrina
description: Parking next to the urbanization and cafeteria-restaurant. Very quiet place and little traffic, there is always room, although the cafeteria-restaurant is not always open.

title: (09191) Villayerno Morquillas - 51 Calle Real
description: Parking with capacity for 6 AC next to playground and basketball court. Completely level near rubbish bins in a small town with basic services: bar, bakery, etc… Perfect for spending the night on the road if a thick fog bank catches you along the way, something common along this section of the A-1

title: (09140) Quintanilla Vivar - 7 Calle Caseros
description: Quintanilla de Vivar (Burgos) ideal for vans. Very quiet area, no noise and no services but with a garbage container next door, also the town is next to any purchase or need. Very quiet place and the green way of alfoz de Burgo (Santander - Mediterranean) next

title: (09620) Sarracín - 5 Calle Real
description: Parking in the center of town, next to sports areas, gardens, playgrounds and picnic tables. Cement parking well leveled. A few meters away the Taberna de Sarracín, with terrace, and food like hamburgers etc. Ideal to spend the night in a quiet and rural environment very close to Burgos. Source nearby.

title: (09195) Burgos - 1 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Public parking next to municipal swimming pools. At night it is illuminated. The pools are open all summer at a very affordable price and you can eat very well at the pool restaurant and it's also cheap. Across the road there is a fountain river picnic area and areas for skateboarding and cycling. Very nice town to visit Church with a lot of history.

title: (09140) Vivar del Cid - 1 Calle Carrimoza
description: Parking by the church with easy access. Quiet, level and without services. Surrounded by gardens and a playground. Ideal to visit Vivar del Cid start of the Camino del Cid route

title: (09140) Quintanilla Vivar - 2 Camino Villanueva
description:
Very large car park, used by harvesters at the end of July. Very close to local supermarket and pharmacy.

close to the highway

title: (09130) Tardajos - 2 Calle Calzada
description: Future public Ac... The Town Hall has an idea of setting up a loading and unloading area for water, tables, trees and lampposts... from what a man from the town said. At the moment it is a quiet level gravel area where you can sleep well, with a fountain 50m away. You can walk through the town and walk to the next town (1km) and climb a path to a viewpoint. The town has shops, bars, bakery, pharmacy, butcher and Caixa bank

title: (09131) Villarmentero - 1 Calle Carretera
description: Municipal estate collected and with tables. very quiet and close to the national road (1 km) and the highway (2 km)

title: (09193) Los Tomillares - 1 Calle Valparaíso
description: Good place to spend the night next to Burgos. Very quiet urbanization with gardens and parks. At night not a noise!

title: (09620) Cojóbar -
description: This is the parking lot at the entrance to the place known as The European Garden. It is a small park with picnic tables, benches, shadows, a small artificial lake with ducks, and walks and routes from here. Close to the Vía Verde that passes through the entrance of the town. Fairly level site with room for several ACs and vans.

title: (09140) Sotopalacios - 4 Calle Medio
description: Small picnic area accessed by track in good condition, has a couple of tables to eat. Very quiet area with space for two or three small or medium vans.

title: (09230) Buniel - 67 Calle el Marqués
description: Great stop off. Did not look very promising from outside but best coffee ever so far! Lovely fresh cakes pastries tapas and snacks. Small shop. Will definitely visit again. Great big car park plenty space for Campervan.

title: (09131) Las Quintanillas - Paseo la Tejera
description: Town scale. Quiet place to stop to eat or rest.

title: (09620) Revillarruz - 147 Calle las Moreras
description: Ample parking and in a quiet and very safe area, surrounded by nature, tables, a fountain and swings.  Easy exit to the highway

title: (09320) Sarracín - Ctra. Nal-N.1 P.K.225,5
description: Service station with friendly staff, cafeteria, toilets and water filling.

title: (09620) Revillarruz - 111 Urbanizacion Sau
description: Parking without apparent use, spacious and quiet, a stream passes about twenty meters

title: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - 19 Camino Cementerio
description: Ample asphalt parking on the way to the cemetery. Fairly flat. Some shady areas at various times of the day due to the presence of trees and vegetation. Next to a small stream and close to the road.

title: (09591) Rioseras - 7 Diseminado Diseminados
description: It is a picnic area in the town of Rioseras next to a small stream. It is a quiet place with trees and shade and with barbecues and a fountain to spend a pleasant afternoon with the family. You can park on the track next to it, which is concrete and perfectly flat.

title: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - C.los Nogales
description: Quiet parking in urbanization you spend the night very quietly

name: Camping Quinta De Cavia
title: (09239) Camping Quinta De Cavia
description: Road to the campsite, very good food in the restaurant. Newly repaired services. Pool in summer, light for plants, trees do not especially take exit 18 as shown, otherwise you will end up on a building site ... Take exit 16 and turn around because only exit 17 reaches the campsite, go through the petrol station and it's just after the restaurant

title: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - 53-55 Calle la Iglesia
title_short: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - 53-55 Calle la Iglesia
description: Park at the end of the village with a small parking, benches for picnic, spring and swings. Ideal for stopping to rest, did not create problems for the night.

title: (09239) Cavia - 3 Calle San Miguel
description: On the bank of a river. Very well calm and green. Ideal for a break. Forbidden to stay the night

title: (09591) Villaverde-Peñahorada - 2 Calle Iglesia
description: Source of drinking water in Villaverde de Peñahorada

title: (09290) Quintanapalla - 12 AP-1
description: Repsol gas station with GPL and 4 dumping places for campers to discharge the gray water and to top up drinking water.

title: (09290) Quintanapalla - 12 AP-1
description: Repsol gasoline pending inauguration, seen today December 5, 2021

title: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - Carretera de Logroño
title_short: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - Carretera de Logroño
description: Paved parking next to the Atapuerca Visitor Center. We had a night without problems. It is highly recommended to visit the Atapuerca field and the Paleolitico Vivo park in Salgüero de Juarros.

title: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - 29 Camino del Pajarillo
title_short: (09198) Ibeas de Juarros - 29 Camino del Pajarillo
description: It is the little parking of the archaeological site Atapuerca. no facilities. Very quiet place with good sunset view. no signs. gravel road but easy to access.

title: (09150) Burgos - BU-622
description: Picnic area with tables and benches, barbecue areas. Nice pitches also right next to the chapel. Absolutely quiet. On the street are garbage and glass containers.

title: (09191) Burgos - 79A Calle Eras
description: Cemetery car park

title: (09591) Villaverde-Peñahorada - CL-629
description: Perfect esplanade to spend the night, very close to the climbing routes. Watch out for the speed bump at the entrance, be careful

title: (09199) Atapuerca - 4 Calle Camino de Santiago
description: Very quiet area with 4 parking lots, the road passes nearby but hardly any cars pass. We have spent a very pleasant night here, only the roosters were heard.

title: (09199) Atapuerca - Camino de Fresno de Rodilla
title_short: (09199) Atapuerca - Camino de Fresno de Rodilla
description: Parking together Archeology Center. You can stay overnight. without services

title: (09230) Estépar - 94 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Truckers restaurant. Shower. Key collection at the restaurant bar.

title: (09320) Cogollos - Madrid - Burgos
description: Rest area and picnic area 300 meters from the highway. Ideal to stop to eat or rest. You can also sleep even though you can hear the traffic on the A1. Accessible to vehicles up to 7.50 meters, picnic tables and some shade trees. No water sources or other types of services.

title: (09339) Villangómez - 35 Calle el Prado
description: Beautiful and large green area with shade, a pond and picnic tables. A flat space very close to the town that has a beautiful route of murals, made by artists on the walls of the town's houses. The town has a very cozy bar-restaurant In mid-August, in this town 20km from Burgos, the Pollogomez festival is celebrated. (Area in the process of improvement)

title: (09339) Villangómez - unnamed road
description:
Hermitage of Fuenteltoro. Small esplanade next to the Hermitage, with cement picnic areas, a drinking water fountain and a pleasant walk to the town on the edge of the river.
Pretty flat space, for several vans or ACs.

title: (09320) Valdorros - 4 Calle los Acebos
description:
Perfect quiet place to spend the night if you're on the road, 5 minutes from the A1 highway to Madrid or Burgos.
quiet and safe flat place, it has a water source where you can supply yourself with free water. Very quiet and safe place, perfect to rest for a night.

title: (09352) - BU-V-9012
description: Quiet place for the night

title: (09199) Arlanzón - 2 Calle el Balneario
description: Parking of the Arlanzón swimming pools. In October it is empty and very quiet. In summer there will surely be cars and a lot of activity around the pools and the bar. I have indicated the coordinates of the point of the road where it is accessed, not the car park itself, but it is only a few meters further. It is very easy to get to, and there are signs on the road. There is no sign that prohibits staying overnight. The place is perfect to spend a night, and near here there is a bike route: "Green Path of Demand", an old railway route. Nearby there is a public fountain, and recycling containers in the sports center. Also a couple of bars and a restaurant.

title: (09292) Monasterio de Rodilla - Camino de la Granja
title_short: (09292) Monasterio de Rodilla - Camino de la Granja
description: Large tarmac and lighted parking lot, quiet although you can hear the motorway a bit

title: (09591) La Molina de Ubierna - 358 Calle Burgos
title_short: (09591) La Molina de Ubierna - 358 Calle Burgos
description:
Many parking options on a flat surface on the edge of La Molina de Ubierna. Built for a future residential area. Good starting point for (continuation of) the via verde.
No shade and very open terrain

title: (09352) Cubillo del Campo - 20 Calle Montaña
description: Nice town to spend the night. Quiet night.

title: (09591) La Molina de Ubierna - C. Encimera
title_short: (09591) La Molina de Ubierna - C. Encimera
description: A single level parking lot. The rest of the space with unevenness. Quiet and beautiful place, isolated and in nature.

title: (09199) Arlanzón - 42 BU-820
description: Picnic place but also to sleep quiet and there is water.

title: (09150) Huérmeces - 11 Calle Camino Vega
description: Fountain with plenty of space to park next to it and recharge

title: (09320) - 3 Calle Sector 1
description: Abandoned area totally flat in concrete. Super clean and far enough from the road not to hear the cars. Ideal for spending the night.

title: (09199) Barrios de Colina - 1 Calle Iglesia
description: Small esplanade of land next to the road. We spent a very quiet night, I do not even pass a car. Near the town but without services.

title: (09320) Valdorros - 216 A-1
description: A picnic site on north bound motorway. Picnic site with tables and bins, a slight incline so need chokes for overnight. Better follow the track for 100m or 200m to pull overs on the right, slight hump to go over on the first one.

title: (09292) Monasterio de Rodilla - Monasterio de Rodilla
title_short: (09292) Monasterio de Rodilla - Monasterio de Rodilla
description: Quiet parking on the outskirts of the town. Surrounded by nature. Nearby is a hermitage with drinking water and tables to eat.

title: (09320) Burgos - 8 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking space on the side of a small road at the end of the village. There's a well where you can get water. A sign tells you where you can go hiking.

title: (09141) Castrillo de Rucios - 5631 Calle Real
description: Area with soccer and basketball courts. Tables in a meadow.

title: (09227) Villaldemiro - Autovía de Castilla
description: Rest area with tarmac parking for vans, cars and trucks, a toilet block (closed overnight, opens around 8am), picnic tables, small bins and a small park for children.

title: (09227) Villaldemiro - Autovía de Castilla
description: Rest area with toilets and tables on each side of the highway.

name: Camping Picón Del Conde
title: (09292) Camping Picón Del Conde
description: Nice campsite, plenty of individual pitches, maybe 30. Water, electricity, toilets, shower, swimming pool.

title: (09641) Cuevas de San Clemente - Camino de los Arrieros
title_short: (09641) Cuevas de San Clemente - Camino de los Arrieros
description: Green ideal place with shade, tables and a trough with water without disturbing anyone. Very calm. Hiking.

title: (09199) Urrez - C.Real
description: Quiet and handsome town. Hiking and mountain biking.

title: (09227) Villaldemiro - 11 Camino de las Bodegas
description: Quiet place next to the church at the top of the town away from noise and traffic, ideal to spend the night and continue the trip

title: (09141) Quintanilla Sobresierra - 27 Travesía Centro
description: Quiet picnic area next to a children's playground, with a fountain

title: (09199) Villasur de Herreros - BU-820
description: Small rest area with drinking water and garbage cans. no parking but just room for a stopover.

title: (09339) Villamayor de los Montes - BU-V-1411
description: It is next to the city's municipal swimming pools. Perfect to spend the day and cool off surrounded by wheat fields.. And the very cool town, with a church and spectacular views..

name: Camping Puerta de la Demanda
title: (09199) Camping Puerta de la Demanda
description: 25 km from Burgos, quiet and green. Friendly welcome

title: (09220) Pampliega - Camino de los Arenales
description: Close to the motorway, a motorhome area a little before, the access path is very clean, no holes or too large stones, the farmer passed by tractor without telling me, lying down and sunrise superb, I'm sure there are plenty of other spots around given the number of paths there are

title: (09133) Olmos de la Picaza -
description:
Superb view of the snow-capped mountains 5 km from Villadiego.
30m from the not very busy road on one end of the old road. No tree.
Ideal for a picnic (which we did) and the possibility of spending the night.

title: (09642) Cubillejo de Lara - 3 Calle San Martin
title_short: (09642) Cubillejo de Lara - 3 Calle San Martin
description: Parking with lots of space in the center of Cubillejo De Lara. There are no services, but it is very quiet and the people of the town very friendly. You can visit the Cubillejo dolmen, a pre-Roman tomb or hiking up to Peñalara.

title: (09199) Arlanzón - Carretera de Logroño
description: Picnic area with benches, tables, garbage cans. Source

title: (09125) Montorio - Unnamed Road
description:
Quiet place next to the hermitage, with tables, shade and fountain. If there is no water, there is also a fountain in Montorio. The access road is paved.
There are many paths for mountain biking routes, and you are just a step away from the Las Loras Geopark and Alto Ebro and Rudrón. You also have the San Martín de Ubierna climbing area nearby.
Take care of this place because it is a spectacular environment to rest and be calm.
There are recycling containers in both Montorio and Quintanilla Sobresierra.

title: (09226) La Estación - N-620a, Pk 32, 3
description: Service station with free motorhome area near a small oasis (1 km). Village with river and beach, playground and refreshments.

title: (09123) Olmillos de Sasamón - 2 Travesía la Ronda
title_short: (09123) Olmillos de Sasamón - 2 Travesía la Ronda
description: Day and night ideal for visiting the city. There is a castle hotel and churches to see. There are children playing next door and there are green areas where you can play.

title: (09220) Pampliega - 1 Carretera Villazopeque
description: Ideal place for siesta, lawn playground and fountain.

name: Repsol | Olmillos de Sasamón
title: (09123) Repsol | Olmillos de Sasamón
description: Gas station with campervan parking places, dump station, drinkable water and nice toilets at the station. Friendly people working there. Good for a stop on the road. Also, good coffee.

title: (09227) Hontanas - 45 Calle Real
description: Public parking on grass on the edge of the center of pittoresk town of Hontanas. Right on the Camino de Frances so perfect to support the pilgrims! No signs of camping prohibited. Very calm, with a stair down which takes you directly to the main street where the church, bars, albergues and several watertaps are to be found.

title: (09227) Hontanas - 3 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free carpark in front of the beautiful pool and bar. Come and relax with a cold drink with lovely staff. Camping welcome! Swimming pool entrance:3 euro for adults and 1.50 euro for kids ?

title: (09123) Sasamón - Camino de Sasamón
description: Quiet place away from the town and idyllic. It is located under a poplar grove on the outskirts of town, near the Municipal Soccer Field. It is accessed by a paved dirt road in good condition and has tables and chairs.

title: (09269) Santa Cruz de Juarros -
description:
Terreno poco llano a 50 metros de la playa del embalse. 
el acceso es estrecho y bacheado con maleza y piedra suelta. No apto para vehículos grandes o con poca altura de bajos. 

lugar perfecto para descansar . Tan solo se escuchan las aves del entorno. 
fácil para bañarse si el tiempo acompaña. 

el acceso está junto a la señal de el matorro .

title: (09123) Sasamón - 13 Calle Amadeo Rilova
description: Municipal parking level with water and that has a green area with a park for children. Located in front of a mechanical workshop. Ideal for visiting the town, which has many important cultural monuments.

title: (09123) Sasamón - 2 Calle Eras
description:
Public barbecue area "La Cambija" with a large covered picnic area for about 100 people.
It has light, electrical outlet, and water.
Ideal to eat and spend the day visiting this beautiful city.
It has a small parking lot across the street.
In addition to being next to the sports court and the municipal swimming pools.
Ancient Roman fountain and wash houses.

title: (09123) Sasamón -
description: Quiet and secluded place to stop on the way. Next to the river and Roman bridge.

title: (09199) Villasur de Herreros - BU-820
description: Perfect site at the edge of the tank. The access is a bit scary at the beginning (en route) but there is no problem. Quiet night, for the day when people can fish or picnic. 3 km from the greenway of demand.

title: (09125) Villalibado - 1 Calle Iglesia
description: Abandoned and recovered town for tourism. Possible overnight areas around the Church. Little light pollution, good view of the sky. Very calm. No noise at night or during the day.

title: (09199) Villasur de Herreros - BU-820
description: Platform at the lake with a great view. It's almost flat, the water is right next door and you're alone in the world. The path is a little steep but by going slowly it passes. We went down with a heavy weight. In the top ! be careful not for camping car.

title: (09257) Villafranca Montes de Oca - Unnamed Road
title_short: (09257) Villafranca Montes de Oca - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the middle of nature, without service. Near an artificial lake. Hyper calm.

title: (09346) Covarrubias -
description: Parking near the hermitage of the Virgen de las Mamblas. Although on the way there are many quite flat and wide places to park, this one is just 100 meters from the hermitage, at the edge of the track that leads to it. The track is in good condition for all types of vehicles, and it is taken just at the Covarrubias exit, towards Mecerreyes. The crossing is well indicated. The Camino del Cid passes through here, and there are several routes to do, both on foot and by mountain bike.

title: (09199) Villasur de Herreros - BU-820
description: Good place to spend the night next to the swamp. Easy access for any vehicle and flat area. It is on the side of the road, but has almost no traffic. In front of the swamp.

title: (09650) Lara de los Infantes -
description: Beautiful, quiet place with a 360 ° C view. Old ruin immediately away, via ferrata and alpine climbing nearby. Only 4x4 vehicles no paved road. We met locals and talked to them very quietly, no walkers only off-roaders.

title: (09341) Santa Cecilia -
description: Place in the middle of nature on the edge of a small road. We stopped at the end of the afternoon in the shelter of a small grove. Very quiet and perfectly flat. Virtually no traffic. Excellent night.

title: (09120) Villadiego - 2A Calle Puente Romano
description: Centrally located mobilhomes parking space on concrete. Very quiet, lit with 2 street lamps at night. There are no yapping dogs here, it has everything next to it. Restaurant 200m away. There are many small bars in the center.

title: (09257) Villafranca Montes de Oca - Unnamed Road
title_short: (09257) Villafranca Montes de Oca - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet, tables and ample parking, you can hear the water of the stream

title: (09651) Lara de los Infantes -
description: Wonderful quiet Spot! The dirt road ist not difficult but 4x4 only (not bigger than VW T4/T5 or similar).Grassy area next to a small stream. 3G with 3/4 bars available. I‘m in love…

title: (09199) Pineda de la Sierra - BU-820
description: Easy access for the top parking. Lower level near the beach  for 4x4 only. Nice views, very quiet. Spent here a day wanted to stay longer but had to keep going.

title: (09390) Villalmanzo - 49 Arrabal Zona de Bodegas
description: Area with picnic tables. Lots of shade, water fountain, barbecues. Along the road. Good place to stop for lunch.

title: (09342) Santa María del Campo - 1 Calle Polideportivo
title_short: (09342) Santa María del Campo - 1 Calle Polideportivo
description: Free overnight area for motorhomes, caravans and campers. It has an area enabled for the discharge of both black and gray water, as well as water load. Quiet place next to the soccer field and the municipal swimming pools (July and August)

title: (09142) Masa - CL-633
description: Simple, flat course next to a small country road with a wide view, heathland, no buildings

title: (09119) Los Balbases - 7 Camino Barrio San Esteban
title_short: (09119) Los Balbases - 7 Camino Barrio San Esteban
description: parking in the middle of a small park and a very quiet playground to spend the night there.

title: (09199) Alarcia - 14 BU 813
description: Very large parking lot, without shade, free Wi-Fi and without code, drinking water, emptying and a very quiet and safe area, crossing the town's canteen road that acts as an information point and manages the connection of electrical energy and running water for filling Water

title: (09141) - 3 Calle Carretera
description: Well-defined asphalt parking on the back of one of the cheapest gas stations in Burgos. Bar and day menu. Quiet and safe.

title: (09640) Campolara - Arroyo de Camposetal
description: Day and night parking of the site of the Dinosaurs. gravel. no services. nice ballad.

title: (09141) Cernégula - 11 Calle la Herrera
description: Nice place to stop to eat and rest, shaded by trees and next to a pond with water. Clean water tap and wastebaskets.

title: (09199) Alarcia - 17 Diseminado Alarcia
description: Esplanade in the Church of the Assumption. Drinking water source. Road with little traffic.

title: (09343) Villahoz - 5 Carretera Mahamud
description: Small village of 300 super pretty souls. we parked on this plot where there is a drinking fountain. the locals are very friendly.

title: (09340) Lerma - BU-904
description: Small path for spot van at the edge of a river, quiet for a quiet night.

title: (09247) Salinillas de Bureba - Diseminados, 17
description: Santa Casilda area, above is the sanctuary to visit.

title: (09347) Puentedura - 11 Calle del Río
description: River area without services. Quiet, shade, grass, next to the town

name: Area de Autocaravanas Covarrubias
title: (09346) Area de Autocaravanas Covarrubias
description: The aire has moved further along the road and is now a large gravel area with new drive. Waste disposa and potable water. The site is on a slope.

title: (09347) Puentedura - 25 Calle del Río
description: Ideal parking for a very quiet night and day. Very close bathing area Drinking water source at the entrance next to the bridge.

title: (09248) Valdazo - 2 Calle Doctor Abilio del Campo
title_short: (09248) Valdazo - 2 Calle Doctor Abilio del Campo
description: Sandy parking passable at the entrance of the small village with a lot of charm, well received by the inhabitants, little traffic, very wild and atypical with sheepfold, cat, frog, stream and owl, pretty steep little village, easy access for large motorhomes, trash and selective sorting nearby. 3km from the highway.

title: (09347) Quintanilla del Agua - 13 Calle Pielagos
description: Nice place next to the river, with 2 picnic tables and surrounded by trees so it gives shade, there is also good cover. Fit about 6 vans.

title: (09346) Covarrubias - 5A Calle Tenerias Bajas
description: Small car park (10 spaces), going down a ramp to the left after crossing the road bridge, which comes from Sto. Silos Sunday. There are no signs that prevent parking and overnight in that place. Located in the very center of the town, with many restaurants, bars, monuments and streets with houses that give a totally medieval aspect to the old town. It is recommended to visit and purchase typical and artisan products (pasta, bread, black pudding, etc.)

title: (09347) Santillán del Agua - 15 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Artificial beach (The dam). Very nice place with picnic tables, swings and there is a grill area, but it does not have the grills. A little further on from the swings there is a dam and a very nice area to swim and to walk with dogs. Quite a large area to park with very large motorhomes. Good access. there are 2 large garbage cans. There are no services.

title: (09340) Lerma - 4 Camino el Parque
description: Parking next to an institute and municipal swimming pools. Wide and without services. We slept three motorhomes and we were very quiet

name: Camping Covarrubias
title: (09346) Camping Covarrubias
description: Camping Covarrubias with access to the swimming pool.

title: (09340) Lerma - 9 Camino el Parque
description: Site with tables to eat, playground for children, football field to play, near municipal swimming pools...

title: (09346) Covarrubias - 11 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Small parking lot on the banks of the Arlanza River, picnic area with barbecues and tables, plenty of shade and cool, quiet during the week, perfect to go with kennels, start of route of a stretch of the road of El Cid. There is no water source, but there is a chiringuito next door and containers for garbage.

title: (09141) Cernégula - CL-633
description: Nice place to spend the night. Picnic tables and tranquility.

title: (09199) Pineda de la Sierra - BU-820
description: Beautiful town of the mountain range, hiking routes by the mining route.

title: (09340) Lerma - 3 Paseo de los Mesones
description: Unpaved area. level. Next to the river. Traffic noise. Quiet enough. There is a fountain and public services. Next to the city center

name: Área de autocaravanas Lerma | Las Palmeras
title: (09340) Área de autocaravanas Lerma | Las Palmeras
title_short: (09340) Área de autocaravanas Lerma | Las Palmeras
description: Private and recently inaugurated motorhome area. The owner is very friendly and attentive at all times. If you want to visit Lerma or if you are passing through, it is highly recommended.

title: (09340) Lerma - 50 Урбанисасьон Уэртас Бахас
description: Area next to Las Palmeras motorhome area

title: (09340) Lerma - 33 Paseo Vista Alegre
description: Dirt parking just behind the bullring, very quiet and close to the old town. We spent the night very quiet.

title: (09340) Lerma - 8 Calle de la Estación
description: Perfect to spend a night and visit the city

title: (09346) Covarrubias -
description: Esplanade next to the Hermitage of San Olav, on the outskirts of Covarrubias. The intersection is well marked, and the track is in good condition for all types of vehicles. Quiet site, with routes from the same parking lot.

title: (09340) Lerma - 22 Calle Cura Merino
description: Very large parking

title: (09341) Tordómar - 79 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Huge esplanade next to the road. Ideal to stop passing without deviating. Quite a lot of traffic and a bell tower next to it that plays all hours of the night.

title: (09199) Pineda de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
title_short: (09199) Pineda de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
description: Abandoned ski resort of Valle del Sol. Parking esplanade practically flat, very quiet, there is a hostel with a bar and restaurant, which is closed, at least when we have been, so I have not included any service. We have spent two nights, and we climbed the Mencilla peak, right in front of the station, spectacular views.

title: (09110) Castrojeriz -
description: Castrojeriz Castle.  The way up is gravel and very steep, which is only possible for 4x4 vehicles or with a very powerful engine.  You have to be careful that there is no ice (in winter) because it will be impossible to go down later.  The view from the top is spectacular.

title: (09240) Briviesca - Autovía del Norte
description: Meat area and free water

title: (09592) Poza de la Sal - 7 Diseminado Diseminados
title_short: (09592) Poza de la Sal - 7 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Quiet green place to eat, with wooden tables, barbecue, children's goals. And it has enough space to park. It is next to Del Rio.

title: (09110) Castrojeriz - 8 Paseo Puerta del Monte
description: Next to the Civil Guard flat, quiet, space for several motorhomes perfect to spend the night next to a playground, supermarket and gas station easy access and maneuver

title: (09119) Villaquirán de la Puebla - Cam. de las Piscinas
title_short: (09119) Villaquirán de la Puebla - Cam. de las Piscinas
description: Municipal swimming pool parking

title: (09240) Briviesca - Autovía del Norte
description: Prima cp, quiet at night and had no problems with the barking of the dogs. Mini market at gas station. Close to the highway.

title: (09110) Castrojeriz - 20 Calle Patronato
description: In this area there are a couple of wide streets where you can park several AC

title: (09109) Villaveta - 21 Calle Traseras San Isidro
description: Curious and new place in the town of Villaveta, super quiet to rest and see starry skies, there is a source of drinking water, and some trees that are still small without much shade, since they have only recently been planted. Next to Castrojeriz Camino De Santiago.

title: (09640) Hortigüela - 17-19 BU-905
description: Ruined church, lots of charm

title: (34257) -
description: Near the river, into a dry riverbed. Nice to take a bath. Maybe only in late summer. Highway is a liiiiittle noisy. No garbage cans or anything. Just nature. Not into the town... 4x4 is maybe necessary

title: (09142) Mozuelos -
description:
Today 07/13/23 totally alone
Esplanade near a road with little traffic,
Quite a few level sites, access for any vehicle, magnificent views of the sunset, no mosquitoes, some flies but everything controlled, no wind, ten minutes from climbing areas and the Blue Well.
I have spent a very pleasant night here dining outside and admiring the stars

title: (34257) Villodrigo - Calle Avenida de Portugal
description: Gas station, rest area and possibility of loading water with hose available. Water not drinkable but good for the tank (dishes and shower)

title: (09640) Hortigüela - 22 BU-905
description:
Tucked away spot next to river.

✔ trees and shade
✔ spots in the sun
✔ river

❌ no services

title: (09347) Ura - 98 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Ura car park, next to the river, picnic tables, games area and in the center of the village a source of drinking water. Ideal for making the excursion through the arlanza de Ura to Castro, 2.5 km, suitable for children, vulture watching.

title: (09240) Briviesca - 23 Calle la Senda
description: The municipality has its own parking space for mobile homes with supply and disposal. Sufficient space, not shaded. There is a container for residual waste on site. A few streets further in town there are containers for glass, waste paper and plastic.

title: (09240) Briviesca - 97 Diseminado Briviesca
description: Norpetrol - gas station, cheap, trucks fill up here. service great.

title: (09640) Hortigüela - 15 BU-905
description: Torcon Recreation Area: Large space with shadows, barbecue area and fountain with little water. Very quiet to sleep despite being near a road where there is virtually no traffic. It has two areas, with two accesses, we were in the second, closer to Covarrubias because it seemed more discreet. The river Arlanza passes nearby and the area of ​​flames "El Torcon".

title: (09240) Briviesca - 24 Avenida Mencía de Velasco
description: Lacolada Burebana laundry, 3 machines, 2 dryers, very clean, parking possible in front, coffee, candy and drink distributor.

title: (34257) Villodrigo - Camino del Espino
description: By the river, next to an agricultural road. A beautiful place, with tall trees, agricultural landscape and the possibility of walking or running along the surrounding agricultural roads.

title: (09248) Bañuelos de Bureba - 3 Calle Mayor
description: Super quiet town. Neighbors are very friendly. From here you can start hikes

title: (34257) Villodrigo - Camino del Espino
description: Shaded area by a river, very quiet. Lots of space for a few vans. River flows fast but can dip in. 4G. Really quiet.

title: (34257) Villodrigo - 5 Avenida de Portugal
description: Very quiet, in the shade in the morning. Right next to the river. There are two small benches and there would be a water tap that we did not find. Literally 2 minutes from the highway. Perfect to spend the night and leave the next day. It must be possible to spend more than one night in case of need. Enter in reverse for large vehicles. The place itself is not recommended for trucks.

title: (34257) Villodrigo - 12 Carretera Valles
description:
Flat car park, reachable for big trucks, no shade, 2 minutes from the speedway. 
Ok for a night or more.

title: (09246) Poza de la Sal - CL-633
description: Large flat tarred square among a field of wind turbines on top of a mountain that can accommodate more than 10 motorhomes with the setting sun
